summary: Three chimps are sent into space to explore the possibility of alien life when an unmanned space shuttle crash lands on an uncharted planet.
cast: Andy Samberg|Cheryl Hines|Jeff Daniels|Patrick Warburton|Kristin Chenoweth|Kenan Thompson|Zack Shada|Carlos Alazraqui|Omid Abtahi|Patrick Breen|Jane Lynch|Kath Soucie|Stanley Tucci|Wally Wingert|Jessica Gee-George|Tom Kenny|Jason Harris|Jay Keiser|Tom Jacomb|Curtis Augspurger|Jess Harnell|Ellie Harvie|Caitlin McKenna|Eliza Bayne
title: Space Chimps. Misión espacial
